name: allstars
description: AllStars wedding quiz game platform monorepo

scripts.dev: concurrently -n admin,host,participant,projector,socket,firebase -c bgBlue,bgMagenta,bgGreen,bgCyan,bgYellow,bgRed "pnpm --filter @allstars/admin-app dev" "pnpm --filter @allstars/host-app dev" "pnpm --filter @allstars/participant-app dev" "pnpm --filter @allstars/projector-app dev" "pnpm --filter @allstars/socket-server dev" "firebase emulators:start --import=./emulator-data --export-on-exit"
